job.title: Cloud Solutions Architect, VMC MSP - Opportunity for Working Remotely
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: strongCloud Solutions Architect  VMware Cloud on AWS VMC VMware Cloud Provider Program VCPPbrbrstrongstronguBusiness SummarybrbrustrongDigital transformation is changing industries and to our customers the application is the lifeblood of the modern organization  its how a business competes in the market and delivers value to its endusers The culmination of macro trends around applications locations and hardware is all about transforming to deliver modern workloads that bring business opportunity No longer are organizations focused on the traditional ntier web and mobile applications Digital foundation will facilitate modern workloads because they will become the new norm  more common place And the applications that drive those workloads will become more composite in nature and therefore we now see the emergence of the subscription economy with freedom to access services and always use them anytime and anywhere with the latest technology or product model available at our fingertips The cloud journey can be difficult as organizations struggle through strategy around rationalization of existing datacenters to choices around hybrid and multicloud models There is unprecedented opportunity today for Managed Services Providers to lead organizations through their cloud journey to the future This is a great and challenging opportunity to join the VMware Cloud Provider MSP program as a Cloud Solution Architect Specialist where you will be at the forefront of multicloud thought leadership and work with Managed Services Providers to drive successbrbrstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongThe Cloud Solution Architect Specialist supporting the MSP Services program within the Cloud Provider program will engage with VMware Sales professionals in selling emTo emand emWithem Managed Service Providers MSP The Cloud Solution Architect Specialist for MSP will be responsible for providing indepth technical product overview roadmap and prescriptive guidance to MSPs to enable them to go to market with public facing cloud service offers built on VMware Cloud solutions and architectures that drive revenue through our MSPs The individual will interface directly with the service provider technical product teams as a trusted advisor and assist in leading and managing the MSPs technical agenda as part of the VMware relationship The individual will also assist to escalate support requests as needed as well as encourage participation in VMware Cloud Services opportunities In addition the individual will drive communication best practices with VMware product Teams and Subject Matter Experts SMEs to provide relevant MSP product feedback that will contribute to VMware product roadmap features and capabilitiesbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliPresent VMware vision strategy and product roadmaps to executives and technical management and illustrate relevant Service Provider use cases for VMware productsliliDrive the adoption and Usage of VMware products and Cloud Solutions within strategic Service Provider accountsliliProvide expert technical and business presales support for strategic opportunities involving VMware Cloud Services including but not limited to VMC on AWS Hybrid Cloud Extension and VeloCloud Assist in technically managing initial proofofconcepts and pilotsliliEvangelize the value of VMware Cloud Provider Hub and build an internal Cloud solution based on VMware Cloud Service offeringsliliMaintain deep technical and business knowledge of Cloud solutions industry directions and trendsliliMaintain working knowledge of competitor products and services and how to position against themliliProvide consultative support to the Field and Partner launch and continuing refinement of VMware productsliliMaintain grow and leverage technical presales relationships with key VMware Partner Field OrganizationsliliLead the technical presales community discussions and facilitate knowledge dissemination to the VMware and Partner Subject Matter Experts with regards to VMware products in conjunction with Cloud solutions and architecturesliliDocument best practices amp architectural references in developing and deploying VMware Cloud solutionsliliWork with VMW aggregators and assigned region partners in driving Webinars conveying the MSP MultiCloud Solutions product portfolio latest product developments to increase solution awareness driving new opportunitiesbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulliMust be able to work collaboratively with othersliliEnthusiastic selfstarter with a charismatic personality with proven track record of selling technical solutions and services as part of a solutionliliProven success and knowledge in developing and leading Service Provider PartnersCustomersliliThe Individual should have relevant and current VMware experience with vCloud Director NSX HCX and VMC on AWS as well as a strong understanding of IT automation management orchestration and cloud management platform capabilities driving IaaS SaaS and PaaS Google Cloud Amazon Cloud and Azure experience is also preferred lili5  8 years of experience in technology related areas including enterprise systems management and infrastructure datacenter architecture experience with significant depth around designing implementing and managing critical business infrastructure Engagement experience should include IT strategy initiatives middleware implementations and leveraging overall technical architecture knowledge across
